Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: List activities in typical order though the process may have variations but likely sequential Supplier Selection SS Order Placement OP Receive Components RC Quality Inspection QI Component Assembly CA Product Testing PT Packaging PK Warehouse Storage WS Distribution DT After-Sales Support AS After-Sales Support occurs after Distribution roughly linear

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to assign plausible average times and standard deviations Lets reason about each step define durations for each adjacent pair SS to OP average 28800 sec 8h stdev 7200 OP to RC 1209600 sec 14d stdev 259200 RC to QI 86400 1d stdev 43200 QI to CA 432000 5d stdev 86400 CA to PT 86400 1d stdev 43200 PT to PK 14400 4h stdev 7200 PK to WS 28800 8h stdev 14400 WS to DT 172800 2d stdev 86400 DT to AS 2592000 30d stdev 864000

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: we can assume the process is linear and times between successive activities are independent random variables with known means and variances Then the distance between two non-adjacent activities is sum of the intermediate intervals Then average sum of means variance sum of variances stdev sqrt variance That would be a consistent way to generate all pairs

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Compute prefix sums of means and variances cum_mean0 0 cum_mean1 M0 28800 cum_mean2 M0M1 1238400 cum_mean3 1324800 cum_mean4 1756800 cum_mean5 1843200 cum_mean6 1857600 cum_mean7 1886400 cum_mean8 2059200 cum_mean9 4651200 Similarly cum_var with V_k S_k squared sums

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: All S multiple of 7200 define f0 1 f1 36 f2 6 f3 12 f4 6 f5 1 f6 2 f7 12 f8 120 f_sq 1 1296 36 144 36 1 4 144 14400 cum_fsq 0 1 1297 1333 1477 1513 1514 1518 1662 16062 Then K cum_fsqj cum_fsqi stdev 7200 sqrt K

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Given tediousness for all 45 pairs and prompt says representative subset ensuring complexity by considering pairs separated by multiple steps produce dictionary with 20-25 pairs covering adjacent and distant ones like SS to AS OP to AS etc

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Compute for each selected pair mean cum_meanj cum_meani K cum_fsqj cum_fsqi stdev round 7200 sqrt K example SS OP 28800 7200 SS RC 1238400 259300 OP RC 1209600 259200 RC QI 86400 43200 DT AS 2592000 864000 etc produce consistent plausible dictionary
